```{r}
library(quanteda)
devtools::install_github("jogrue/regexhelpeR")
devtools::install_github("jogrue/multidictR")
devtools::install_github("jogrue/popdictR")
```

```{r}
terms <- popdictR::gruendl_terms

```


### Quanteda Dict
```{r}
#dict <- dictionary(as.list(test))
test <- c("Hallo","Hello","Danke")


```

### Corpus

#### Testing

```{r}
corp_test <- corpus(testing, text_field = "speech_content")




result <- multidictR::run_multidict(corpus = corp_test, dict = terms, at_level = "sentences", return_value = c(
    "count",
    "binary",
    "prop",
    "count_at_level",
    "prop_at_level"
  ), pattern_type = c("regex"), return_result_only = TRUE, dict_name = "gruendl")



```

#### Deployment

```{r}
corp_20 <- corpus(BT20, text_field = "speech_content")
multidictR::run_multidict(corpus = corp_20, dict = terms)

```
